title: Mixed bean chilli soup
ingredients: ['2 tbsp vegetable oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 red pepper, deseeded and chopped', '1 green pepper, deseeded and chopped', '125g button mushrooms, sliced', '½ tsp chilli powder, or to taste', '1 tsp ground cumin', '400g can mixed pulses, drained and rinsed', '400g can chopped tomatoes', '600ml tomato juice', '300ml vegetable stock', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', 'TO SERVE: 4 tbsp half-fat crème fraîche, fresh coriander sprigs']
